title: Olivia Buckland TRANSFORMS into a living Barbie as unrecognisable star unveils Halloween costume
text:
She is the popular Love Island star known for her edgy fashion ensembles.

But Olivia Buckland was unrecognisable as she transformed into a living Barbie doll for a stunning Instagram snap on Saturday.

The reality personality, 25, shocked fans as she unveiled her incredible Halloween costume, complete with drawn-on cleavage, cosmetically remastered eyes and pop art inspired jaw chiselling.

OMG: Olivia Buckland was unrecognisable as she transformed into a living Barbie doll for a stunning Instagram snap on Saturday

Change: The reality personality, 25, shocked fans as she unveiled her incredible Halloween costume, complete with drawn-on cleavage, cosmetically remastered eyes and pop art inspired jaw chiselling

Looking every inch the glamorous doll in honour of the brand's 60th anniversary, the beauty showcased her ample cleavage and tattooed legs in a black and white geometric print leotard.

Adding a splash of barbie pink, she donned a fluffy jacket.

Olivia donned flowing caramel extensions, with a pair of chic white shades on top of her head.

Giving the illusion of a plastic head, the star sported extreme contouring around the forehead, jaw, lips, nose and eyes in the makeover by renowned make-up artist Anna Lingis.

Barbie Girl: Looking every inch the glamorous doll in honour of the brand's 60th anniversary, the beauty showcased her ample cleavage and tattooed legs in a black and white geometric print leotard

Transformed: Giving the illusion of a plastic head, the star sported extreme contouring around the forehead, jaw, lips, nose and eyes in the makeover by renowned make-up artist Anna Lingis

She wore striking false lashes and coloured contacts, along with white shadow around the eye to give her Bamni-esque peepers.

She wrote: 'Being Barbie really was the BEST DAY EVER. LIVING for this Halloween look @annalingis created on me for the @barbiestyle 60th anniversary.. #HalloweenBarbie

The transformation shocked fans, with one writing: 'What the hell this is unreal while another added: 'You look unreal!'

A third wrote: 'Wow!! I thought it was a drawing' while a fourth typed: 'how good is this halloween makeup'.

Olivia is married to Alex Bowen, 28, who she wed in a beautiful ceremony at 16th century country house Gosfield Hall in Essex on September 15th last year.

Happy couple: Olivia is married to Alex Bowen, 28, who she wed in a beautiful ceremony at 16th century country house Gosfield Hall in Essex on September 15th last year

Many people doubted the couple - who met on the Love Island 2016 series - would stay together, falling to the wayside like so many from the ITV series.

'We'll be together till we're old and grey,' said Olivia, answering those critics before Alex added: 'There’s not much to say, really, is there? I think our wedding rings speak for themselves.'

The pair also revealed what keeps them so in love as they discussed their favourite things about one another, with Alex urging Olivia to 'keep it clean'.

'I like how weird he is. From looking at him, you’d think he’s so good-looking, he can’t have an interesting personality, too. But he does. He’s a little bit of a weirdo,' said Olivia, making her beau 'blush'.

While Alex sweetly admired his wife's genuine nature, gushing that 'nothing is ever fake about her'.

The pair are currently appearing on TLC in a new reality show called Olivia and Alex: Happily Ever After.

The series is set one year after their star-studded nuptials and follows the pair as they settle into married life in Essex.

In a teaser for the show Alex was seen speaking about his desire for a baby, telling his wife: 'I'm 28 this year, I want to be one of them young dads'.

But Olivia counter-argues: 'You don't realise how much a baby will change your life!'

Alex and Olivia celebrated one year of marriage last month, with the pair jetting off to Santorini, Greece to mark the occasion.
description: Olivia Buckland was unrecognisable as she transformed into a living Barbie doll for a stunning Instagram snap on Saturday.
